website_summaries.verdict: The best way to eliminate pet odors for long periods of time.
pros: Wipes include aloe and coconut, which are soothing on pets fur and skin
Wipes keep pets smelling fresh for hours
Large wipes are quite moist and don’t leave any residue behind
Wipes effectively dispense one wipe at a time
cons: Strong coconut scent may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordinarily like Tropiclean products, but I have been disappointed by the deodorizing wipes for dogs. I have a miniature Wire-hair Dachshund. I groom and bathe him regularly. In between bathes I use three to four wipes without noticing any difference in cleanliness or smell. The wipes seem to me to be to dry to work well. Therefore, I’m not satisfied with the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Haag

customer_reviews.title: Safe, soothing, scented quick cleanup for pets
customer_reviews.text: These (& Tropiclean medicated itch relief shampoos) have been our go-to for smelly pups since finding them years ago. The gentle formula cleans, soothes & deordarizes without irritation or harsh chemicals. And the ingredients are safe! The shampoo is made in the good ol' USA; however, the sheets are made in China. (C'mon Tropiclean, you can find a way to make them here!)
customer_reviews.author: LBK

customer_reviews.title: non toxic and get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dog a lot and like to wipe paws when we come home......this is awesome....I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I would love if it had just a bit more water in the package...what I do is I store it upside down so the top wipes are not dry!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few other times and had to add the dry bath liquid because they are so dry. This wipe is a perfect softness but no scent & solution. I don’t want a drippy wipe but change the packaging so not so dry.
customer_reviews.author: Fit4life

customer_reviews.title: Not wet
customer_reviews.text: These smell pleasant and the packaging is nice, but they are dry. I expected them to be wet like my other puppy wipes.
customer_reviews.author: KBTTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My fabulous dog, Ruby, has bad knees. Because of her disability, when she potties she gets soiled. These work great to keep her clean. I also use them to clean her eyes. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Norgard

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have allergies and these don't bother me, very simple ingredients. One package lasted me one year, because my dog "sheds dirt" pretty easily. They stayed moist. I love these wipes. They leave my dog feeling clean and take away dog stink. I use them in her ear too, a light swab. Perfect wipes don't change anything
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I would of loved if these had a scent, but either way they did exactly what I expected. The wipes are a good size. They did clean my dog up till there next bath.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It hardly smelled like coconut as it claims, and wipes are very dry. I have to wet them with water so that they work effectively when I clean my dog. Don't know if I got a bad batch, but I didn't like these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product head zero sent to it. The description mentions a light smell of coconut which it had none. It did nothing for the natural order my dog has. Will not be buying again. In fact there's no point in using this entire package because it does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: ... came back inside of the house with his paws dirty full of wet soil
customer_reviews.text: My dog came out after the rain and came back inside of the house with his paws dirty full of wet soil, I opened the bag of wipes, and when she start sniffing she liked it! she was very happy and exited, let it me clean her paws, she usually avoids cleaning her paws with a regular wipes water that I buy at a pharmacy. my dog really love her the smell of this product, and it clean very well. I am very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica S. Devia

customer_reviews.title: Love these and great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! Best value for the money as well I’m a dog groomer and use these for my clients pups as well as my own pups!! Smell great does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Susie Glass

customer_reviews.title: Where Is The Nice Smell?
customer_reviews.text: This product would no doubt be used more if there was a nice coconut scent. I was disappointed that there is basically no scent---and so is my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for instant refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Really takes the stink off our active black lab. Scent is barely there, but wipes are really effective. Plus she loves getting rubbed with them and runs to us when she hears the package open!
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: Get your dogs paws clean after who knows what they step in!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! After walks and brush downs I wipe my 70 lb American Bulldog/Australian Cattle dog down with one or two wipes, he loves the pampering, I love the cleanliness of paws and coat! Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Byington

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are large which is a huge plus and moist enough to clean crud without soaking your pooch. Not scented at all and perfect for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn

customer_reviews.title: Very Dry
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I received an old item but the wipes are dry. Can't use any of these. I will not buy these again and may try other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Banana Peter

customer_reviews.title: The perfect white for dogs paws and face
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick wipes for my dog's feet when he comes in. No overpowering scent
customer_reviews.author: Sharon White/Smith

customer_reviews.title: not the coconut scent
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but I don't like the scent. It doesn't smell like coconut. Cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The dogs like them. I wipe them down when they come in from being outside.
customer_reviews.author: H. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Too dry
customer_reviews.text: I land up adding moisture to these wipes to use. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: IR

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Pollen is so bad this year. Add summer sweat to it, and my big dogs STINK! Wipe them down when they come in and it’s SO much better!
customer_reviews.author: SHELBY N

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Had no smell to it. They’re probably too old and been sitting somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cici

customer_reviews.title: A+ wipes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wipes, they don't smell like coconut. My dog loves for me to wipe him down. After i brush his teeth he'll stay standing there waiting for me to wipe him down b4 bed.
customer_reviews.author: GJM

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Thick and holds up. I clean dog’s ears out with it too. Less fuss than cotton balls with ear cleaner on them. And they stay moist after opening. Love Tropiclean products - recommended by the breeder.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene F. Greising

customer_reviews.title: Dry towels
customer_reviews.text: Was ok. Most of the towels were dry when I got them. I kept the lid closed and stored in a cool area. There is no scent, don’t let the name and the picture of the coconut fool you.
customer_reviews.author: Mikie C

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly kind of disappointed about these whipes. They don't reay seem to much for my dog. I do however like to use them to get grime off her paws
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thick wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes for dogs. I used them to wipe our dogs' feet and in between their toes to help battle any seasonal allergy issues that make them itch.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: textured, nice smell, and effective for quick puppy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: These are great in a pinch when the puppy gets smelly. We also use the shampoo, but these work well for catching her quickly in between baths. They have a slight texture so that they actually clean, not just wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Enchanting MamaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: These really do work between bathes. The smell goes away, and the dirt goes away.... you have to use a few for each dog but it’s worth it to get rid of the Dog Smell :O)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPowerShopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Was so hopeful these would be a handy quick wipe for my dog. But, the wipes are barely damp. Thought maybe it would just be the top couple of wipes but no. Wouldn’t waste my money again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justahkr

customer_reviews.title: it work great for every day use
customer_reviews.text: it is nice scent and it does not fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Ningning from California USA

customer_reviews.title: great wipes, must have!
customer_reviews.text: great size for our 9 lb dog, i can wipe his whole body and get the dirt and pollen off. Just enough moisture to grab stuff without pushing it around on him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful size and scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of these, and ease of use! Great scent!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Go to doggie wipes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wipe to use! They smell so good too!
customer_reviews.author: Cherri Wollenweber

customer_reviews.title: Nonirritating and my dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only products that I can use on my cocker spaniel without totally irritating his skin. Great for wipe downs after long walks or for loose drops of pee on your pets feet.
customer_reviews.author: James Finch

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: very handy to just wipe some mud off the pup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, not very wet
customer_reviews.text: This product had great reviews, but they just didn't seem very moist to me, which made me feel like it was doing the job in cleaning off my pups paws. Nice smell tho!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to dispense and almost dry.
customer_reviews.text: The cloths are barely moist. They’re practically dry. I have to wet them with water. The scent is barely there because of dryness and softness is probably good if moist.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELINA

customer_reviews.title: I love these wipes they are actually Hypo Allergenic and work ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes they are actually Hypo Allergenic and work great for my Dachshund who has to get wiped off every time he comes in from outside to prevent him from breaking out in hives from the Coral Dust we have here in FL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of wipes! I also bought the shampoo that is excellent! The coconut smell is amazing and my doggy is so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Rae

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I likes the wipes the packaging, and having it at the door as my pup come in, will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra S. Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Good for paws only
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do much, I have to use the dog spray with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice smell. worked great for my cat who always gets really messy.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Cloths dry with no noticeable scent. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dried wipes
customer_reviews.text: They were dried, the ones that I get in petco have a scent and are wet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Douji is sometimes hesitant to stand still to let me use wipes. But when she see the package she quickly comes and wait patiently until I finish.
customer_reviews.author: delorse burton

customer_reviews.title: For my itchy pug.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pug with many spring allergies. These wipes have helped her keep her skin less itchy. Leave her coat soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: CLIFFORD WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Smells great! (And I hate most smells!)
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy cloth and smells so delightful that I even use to wipe my child’s feet when dirty from playing outside.
customer_reviews.author: kevin powers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the actual wipes. Also they smell great but not strong. My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: Bad Moisture
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package and used first five wipes the rest feel very dry and do not last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best product for my dog everyday when we get home from the dog park!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Russo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great, and my pup gets so excited when I grab the bag. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean-up for my pup when we come in from a hike!
customer_reviews.author: Holly R.

customer_reviews.title: Clean well
customer_reviews.text: Work fantastically; don't have a strong scent at all and clean very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Bad.
customer_reviews.text: I have an all white pittie pup who LOVES getting into everything. I bought these wipes in hopes that I could use these instead of wiping her down with a damp cloth, but I think I'll just have to stick with that. These wipes are very dry, and they don't smell like anything. The label should state that they're scent free. Packaging is perfect, can't complain about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We were hoping for something that would help eliminate odor ...
customer_reviews.text: We were hoping for something that would help eliminate odor for the car ride home after doggy daycare, and these wipes did not deliver. There is no actual scent.
customer_reviews.author: L8ddi

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my puppy at 3months old and the pet shop gave me the tropiclean brand shampoo for her baths and some bath wipes from a different company. Those finished and i was like the shampoo works well, why not the wipes. They SUCK they are literally wet just enough to wipe all 4 of her xs paws. So dry, no smell nothing. So terrible!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shameeda Altin

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel, not too fragrant at all, just enough softness
customer_reviews.text: Great cloth for sensitive skinned dogs. Just soft enough with the right firmness for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: LuvAmazon

product_meta.title: TropiClean Wipes for Pets
product_meta.description: Style:Hypoallergenic| Size:100 ctTropiClean Hypo Allergenic Deodorizing Bath Wipes are mild enough for puppies, kittens and those with allergies. Our mild coconut cleanser gently lifts away dirt, drool, pollen and other potential unmentionables, leaving them fresh and ready to snuggle.
feature_bullets: Mild formula is ideal for every day use.
Removes dirt, dander and tough odors.
Take your pet to the tropics with the light and sweet scent of coconut that leaves them smelling fresh and ready for cuddles.
You don't have to worry about washing away spot-on treatments! Our TropiClean Hypoallergenic Cleaning Wipes are soap-free for unmistakably fresh pets.

Want even more fresh moments? Our natural pet products include dental care, itch relief, flea & tick solutions and an array of grooming products all designed to let your pet put their best paw forward. You make the moments, we make them fresh.
Safe for routine use when used as directed.
TropiClean Hypoallergenic Cleaning Wipes are 7.8 x 7.8 inches.
For dogs and cats 12 weeks and older.
